name: HELP: THE GAME
description: HELP: The Game is a project which brings together the top developers, studios and gaming industry superstars - all to raise money for children in war.
minimum_requirements: OS: Please check the individual game store pages for the system requirements.

reviews.review_text: 12 games, £10 => charity. The games are a mixed bunch but mostly fun, as you'd expect from the time limit on development. Only one of these wouldn't work for me - Octamari Rescue, which requires a controller.
12 games for £10 (or whatever it is in your currency). A complete bargain! My current favourite is 10 Minute Tower, but I'm sure the others will come into their own at some point too.
